name: Devil's Riposte
description:
A story about the grey area between success and effort.

Devil's Riposte is an RPG set in a realm of demons and follows the children of the current reigning Demon Lord. The story treads the theme of coming to terms with all outcomes out of your control.

I hope you enjoy this little narrative I put together.

Story and Art by

DrawnSimplistic

with assistance from
